Question: A large tank initially contains \(3282\) L of water and \(1\) kg of a chemical. A solution with a concentration of \(0.2\) kg/L flows into the tank at a rate of \(5\) L/min, while the well-mixed solution in the tank flows out at the same rate. How many kilograms of the chemical are in the tank after 5 minutes? Give your answer to two significant figure.
